title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit, the perfect addition to your indoor or outdoor space. This mini-sized fire pit is designed with a concrete material in a stylish graphite color, featuring a marble base effect for an elegant touch.

The Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit is fueled by bio ethanol, providing a clean and environmentally-friendly option. It comes with safety flashback arrestors to ensure a secure and worry-free experience. With over 1 hour of burn time, you can enjoy the warm and cosy atmosphere it creates.

Safety is a top priority with this fire pit. The burn cup material is made of stainless steel, and the burn chamber has rapid cooling capabilities, allowing for quick and efficient extinguishing. An extinguisher tool made of flat stainless steel is also included for added convenience.

Not only does the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit provide heat and ambiance, but it also offers versatility. It can be used both indoors and in the garden, making it a versatile option for any space. Plus, its portable design allows you to easily move it around as needed.

In addition to its functionality, this fire pit also offers additional features. The marble base provides heat dissipation, ensuring the safety of your surfaces. It even allows for cooking delicious treats like smores and marshmallows, adding a fun and tasty element to your gatherings.

For increased burn time and efficiency, the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit includes a ceramic wool insert. This insert enhances the performance of the fire pit, making it a reliable and long-lasting choice.

Enhance your space with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit. Experience the warmth, beauty, and versatility it brings to your indoor and outdoor settings.

Crafted with high-quality concrete material in a sleek graphite color, this fire pit features a stunning marble effect base for heat dissipation. The portable design allows you to easily move it around and enjoy its ambiance wherever you desire.

With safety flashback arrestors, you can have peace of mind while enjoying the mesmerizing flames. It comes with a stainless steel burn cup for durability and rapid cooling of the burn chamber.

Not only does this fire pit provide a warm and inviting atmosphere, but it also serves as a versatile cooking tool. Whether you're craving smores or marshmallows, you can roast them to perfection over the open flames.

Safety is a top priority, which is why this fire pit includes a flat stainless steel extinguisher tool and features like leakage prevention and rapid cooling. Additionally, the ceramic wool insert enhances burn time and efficiency, allowing you to enjoy the fire for over an hour.

The Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit is suitable for both indoor and garden use. It is the perfect addition to your table decor and will create a cozy ambiance for gatherings, parties, or even a quiet evening at home.

Upgrade your space with this stylish and functional fire pit. Experience the warmth, beauty, and versatility it brings to any environment. Get your Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit today and ignite an unforgettable atmosphere.
